resources.string: This email is already signed up. Try activating it on this phone to receive a new verification code.
Sorry the server has failed to respond. Please try again.
The username %1$s is already taken. Please try again with a different username.
Verification code mismatch. Please try again.
You are already Signed up. Please proceed to the verification
The verification code has been sent to %1$s
This email is already taken try signing up with another one.
Don\'t stop this service otherwise you will stop getting message notifications.
Connection Error. Check your Internet Connection and try again.
Connection error. Please check your internet connection and try again later.
Please wait as the verification code is sent to %1$s.
Your account is unauthorized to communicate with the server
